thread.section_title: Gym Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Direct | www.gymdirect.com.au
thread.title: Jason Blackburn
thread.title_full: Gym Direct reviewed by Jason Blackburn

author: Jason Blackburn
title: Jason Blackburn
text:
I have Used Gym Direct A Lot Over 2016-17 The Company Has Set Up My Home Gym Only Complaint i have Is Delivery. We used To get All Items Delivered In a Timely Manner.
This Year For Some Reason The Orders Are Being Divided Up and Delivered On Separate Days.
It Is Really Frustrating Only To Get A Quarter of a Half Rack & Then Have to Wait Several Days Later For The Rest To Arrive
